predicate.comment: Frames file for '특별' based on sentences in Virginia Corpus

example.text: 귀관이 정직하게 말하면 특별한 혜택을 받을 거요.
example.parse: (S (S (NP-SBJ 귀관/NPN+이/PCA) (VP (ADVP (ADV (VJ 정직/NNC+하/XSJ+게/ECS))) (VP 말하/VV+으면/ECS))) (S (NP-SBJ *pro*) (VP (VP (NP-OBJ (S (WHNP-1 *op*) (S (NP-SBJ *T*-1) (ADJP (VJ 특별/NNC+하/XSJ+은/EAN)))) (NP 혜택/NNC+을/PCA)) 받/VV+을/EAN) (VX 것/NNX+이/CO+어요/EFN))) ./SFN)
